Study duration : A minimum yearly accrual 10-15 patients/institution expect . Therefore , reach first stage , study take 1.2 1.8 year one institution , 0.6 0.9 year 2 institution , 0.4 0.6 year 3 . If study continue full accrual 43 patient , completion take 2.9 4.3 year one institution , 1.4 2.2 year two 0.96 1.43 year three institution .
